name: DYOR Token Analytics
description: TON token analytics from DYOR.io -- search, price, trust score, metrics, DEX trades, holders, pools

tools.name: dyor_search
tools.description: Search TON jettons by name or symbol on DYOR.io

tools.name: dyor_details
tools.description: Get full details for a TON jetton by contract address

tools.name: dyor_trust_score
tools.description: Get the DYOR.io trust score (0-100) for a jetton

tools.name: dyor_price
tools.description: Get current price of a jetton in TON, USD, and optional currency

tools.name: dyor_price_chart
tools.description: Get price chart data points over time

tools.name: dyor_metrics
tools.description: Get consolidated metrics (price, holders, liquidity, FDMC, mcap)

tools.name: dyor_stats
tools.description: Get percent change statistics by time period

tools.name: dyor_holders
tools.description: Get holder count and optional holder history ticks

tools.name: dyor_transactions
tools.description: Get recent DEX transactions for a jetton

tools.name: dyor_markets
tools.description: Get DEX pool/market data for a jetton

tools.name: dyor_trending
tools.description: Get trending TON jettons by chosen metric
